snippet: The average price for an apartment passed $1.7 million in the first quarter as the average price per square foot reached $1,363, according to reports by major brokerages.
abstract: Major brokerages report that Manhattan real estate market is off to a robust start in the first three months of 2014r, as signed contracts for ultraluxury apartments in new developments begin to close, many with multimillion-dollar price tags; average price for an apartment passed $1.7 million in the first quarter as the average price per square foot reached $1,363.
lead_paragraph: The average price for an apartment passed $1.7 million in the first quarter as the average price per square foot reached $1,363, according to reports by major brokerages.

headline.main: Ultraluxury Apartment Sales Drive Records in Manhattan Real Estate
headline.print_headline: Ultraluxury Apartment Sales Drive Records in Manhattan Real Estate
